ygData.subject: RE: Re: Pets (was Rumors)
ygData.msgSnippet: IMHO it s pretty cool to top off the buffout d pets health. Was kinda a pain to wait for health to get back up or to dispell / wait for regen and rebuff pets.
ygData.messageBody:
IMHO it's pretty cool to top off the buffout'd pets health. Was kinda a pain
to wait for health to get back up or to dispell / wait for regen and rebuff
pets. Even if the spell is only used in this way, it's worth it. (Buffout
spells being the mage pet buffs, lowering the pets regen rate)

Thormael


PS : I guess it can also be used to avoid loosing a good and buffed pet.
Versus one target it might be cheaper / faster to just nuke it though
(didn't play my mage much lately). :)

-----Message d'origine-----
De: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Date: lundi 24 janvier 2000 15:49
´┐¢: eqbards@onelist.com
Objet: Re: [eqbards] Re: Pets (was Rumors)


From: Papa Legba <legba@...>

Those heal pet spells (as far as I can see) are no great things. Its
more mana efficient to just recast a full health pet for most levels
then to heal it... I guess its nice if you get a really killer pet, but
I dont think magcians are real excited by the pet heal spells...
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
